flavorText:
"I have always imagined my mother as such a woman, strong and wise."
—Sisay, journal

foreignData.name: Friedensstifterin
foreignData.text:
Bezahle während Deiner Versorgungsphase 1W oder begrabe die Friedensstifterin.
Kreaturen können nicht angreifen.

name: Peacekeeper
originalText:
During your upkeep, pay o1o
W or bury Peacekeeper.
Creatures cannot attack.

rulings.text: When the ability resolves, you choose whether to sacrifice the creature or perform the other action. If you can’t perform the other action, then you must sacrifice the creature.
If the creature is no longer on the battlefield when the ability resolves, you may still perform the action if you want.
Peacekeeper’s ability doesn’t cause the combat phase or the declare attackers step to be skipped.

text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Peacekeeper unless you pay {1}{W}.
Creatures can't attack.
